command: dir="$PWD"; while [ -n "$dir" ] && [ "$dir" != "/" ]; do if [ -d "$dir/ai-kb" ]; then cd "$dir/ai-kb" 2>/dev/null && exec ck --serve; fi; next="$(dirname "$dir")"; [ "$next" = "$dir" ] && break; dir="$next"; done; cd "$HOME/ai-kb" 2>/dev/null && exec ck --serve; echo "ck MCP: unable to locate ai-kb" >&2; exit 1
